trans-unit.source: Take advantage of Microsoft HPC Pack and Azure compute and infrastructure services to create and manage a cloud-based high performance computing (HPC) cluster.
trans-unit.target: Take advantage of Microsoft HPC Pack and Azure compute and infrastructure services to create and manage a cloud-based high performance computing (HPC) cluster.

trans-unit.source: [HPC Pack](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj899572.aspx) is Microsoft's free HPC solution built on Microsoft Azure and Windows Server technologies and supports both Windows and Linux HPC workloads.
trans-unit.target: [HPC Pack](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj899572.aspx) is Microsoft's free HPC solution built on Microsoft Azure and Windows Server technologies and supports both Windows and Linux HPC workloads.

trans-unit.source: A cloud-based HPC Pack cluster provides a cluster administrator or independent software vendor (ISV) a flexible, scalable platform to run compute-intensive applications while reducing investment in an on-premises compute cluster infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: A cloud-based HPC Pack cluster provides a cluster administrator or independent software vendor (ISV) a flexible, scalable platform to run compute-intensive applications while reducing investment in an on-premises compute cluster infrastructure.
